Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO SOCIAL SERVICES

Title: Relates to establishing a statewide restaurant meals program as part of the supplemental nutrition assistance program
Summary: Establishes a statewide restaurant meals program as part of the supplemental nutrition assistance program.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a statewide restaurant meals program as part of the supplemental nutrition assistance program
